org.knime.core.data.renderer

Interface DataValueRendererFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataValueRendererFactory, BinaryObjectDataValueMetaRenderer.Factory, BinaryObjectDataValueRenderer.LongHexdumpFactory, BinaryObjectDataValueRenderer.ShortHexdumpFactory, BitVectorValuePixelRenderer.Factory, BitVectorValueStringRenderer.BinRendererFactory, BitVectorValueStringRenderer.HexRendererFactory, BitVectorValueStringRenderer.SetBitsRendererFactory, BooleanValueRenderer.Factory, ByteVectorValuePixelRenderer.Factory, ByteVectorValueStringRenderer.Factory, CollectionValueRenderer.FullRendererFactory, CollectionValueRenderer.ShortRendererFactory, ComplexNumberValueRenderer.Factory, DateAndTimeValueRenderer.DefaultRendererFactory, DateAndTimeValueRenderer.Iso8061RendererFactory, DateAndTimeValueRenderer.UsRendererFactory, DefaultDataValueRenderer.Factory, DoubleBarRenderer.Factory, DoubleGrayValueRenderer.Factory, DoubleValueRenderer.FullPrecisionRendererFactory, DoubleValueRenderer.PercentageRendererFactory, DoubleValueRenderer.StandardRendererFactory, ImageValueRenderer.Factory, IntValueRenderer.Factory, MultiLineStringValueRenderer.Factory, PNGImageValueRendererFactoryUtil.StandardRendererFactory, PortObjectValueRenderer.Factory, StringValueRenderer.Factory, XMLValueRenderer.Factory

    public interface DataValueRendererFactory
    Factory for creating data value renderers. Since instances of the factories are created by the framework, every factory must have a public no-arg constructor. Please consider extending the AbstractDataValueRendererFactory instead of implementing this interface.
    Since:
    2.8
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland
    No public API: not to be implemented by clients

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataValueRenderer createRenderer(DataColumnSpec colSpec)
      Creates a new renderer instance.
      String getDescription()
      Returns a short description for the renderers which this factory creates.
      String getId()
      Returns a unique ID for this renderer.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns a short description for the renderers which this factory creates.
        Returns:
        a short description

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns a unique ID for this renderer. This ID is used by the framework in order to identify renderers.
        Returns:
        a unique ID, e.g. the class name of the implementation

      • createRenderer

        DataValueRenderer createRenderer(DataColumnSpec colSpec)
        Creates a new renderer instance. If the renderer does not use the data column spec the renderer may be implemented as a singleton and the same instance may be returned upon each call. Note that the renderer must be thread-safe in such cases.
        Parameters:
        colSpec - the spec for the column for which this renderer is going to be used
        Returns:
        a data value renderer
